description: File Sharing Wizard version 1.5.0 build 2008 is affected by a Structured Exception Handler based buffer overflow vulnerability. An unauthenticated attacker is able to perform remote command execution and obtain a command shell by sending a HTTP GET request including the malicious payload in the URL. A similar issue to CVE-2019-17415, CVE-2019-16724, and CVE-2010-2331.
